title: Project 1: Personal Website
description: A responsive personal portfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing my projects and skills.

title: Project 2: Python Automation Script
description: A Python script that automates the process of generating reports from CSV data, saving significant time and effort.
instructions:
1. Clone the repo.
2. Install dependencies: `pip install pandas`.
3. Run: `python generate_reports.py`

title: Project 3: Java Data Management App
description: A Java desktop application with a user-friendly GUI for managing and querying customer data, built with Swing.
instructions:
1. Clone the repo.
2. Compile: `javac *.java`
3. Run: `java Main`
